PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-04362010-03-25,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE,  TB,  , 
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectCanadian Broadcasting Corporation (CBC) enter into a lease
PrecisOrder approving that the CANADIAN BROADCASTING CORPORATION / RADIO-CANADA enter into a lease with The Walt Disney Company (Canada) Ltd. for a space within the Canadian Broadcasting Centre at 250 Front Street West in Toronto, Ontario, for a term of 10 years with two options to renew the lease for further periods of five years each, for a total consideration in excess of four million dollars ($4,000,000).
AttachmentsAttachment
